benchmark_details.name: Financial Education Corpus IN SpAnish (FEINA)
benchmark_details.overview: A novel dataset for text simplification in Spanish financial education, consisting of 5,314 complex and simplified sentence pairs aimed at enhancing understanding for visually impaired audiences.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create an accessible text simplification dataset for individuals with visual impairments, aiding comprehension of financial education materials.

data.source: Extracted from selected financial education books designed to release a dataset to the scientific community.
data.annotation: Manually simplified by six advanced philology students using defined simplification rules.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed using automated methods and human evaluators to determine simplification quality.
methodology.interpretation: Lower scores in simplicity metrics indicate better simplification. Higher scores in BLEU and SARI indicate better performance.
methodology.validation: Evaluation of manually generated dataset against outputs from GPT-3, MT5, and Tuner for quality assessment.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Dataset designed to cater specifically to visually impaired individuals.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent obtained from human evaluators in the study.
